textBeforeTable: Visual Characteristics Item # 3728M  Download Datasheet Installation and Maintenance Test Reports Guarantee Request Sample Project Gallery Declaration of Performance Toolbox A comprehensive range of standard metal ceiling panels with a wide choice of edge details to complement Armstrong's range of exposed suspension systems. Available with various perforation patterns to achieve a wide range of visual appearances. Metal Board Plain tiles can be used in ISO 5 clean room environments (former US FS 209E Class 100). INFORMATION Metal Lay-In 3728M
